title: Certificate, May 22, 1861
medium: Engraving; black ink on white paper
signed: Signed by Peter Cooper as Pres., May 22, 1861
description: Horizontal rectangle. An engraved certificate awarded by Cooper Union to William McFaul who "attended the evening course . . . duringthe term beginning October 1st 1860 and ending April 1st 1961 . . . has passed a satisfactory examination in Mathematics." Vignette of the Cooper Union.

tombstone.epitaph: Certificate, May 22, 1861. Engraving; black ink on white paper. 1952-35-1.
